participation_asset().notice: for the purpouses of keeping track of who actually participated in this listing for all purpouses it's just a shadow of the listed asset itself but for future checks and also for redeeming with the returnAsset. this will make sure we only distribute to valid users who purchased. this helps account for when an asset is listed multiple times
